snippet.title: Cefore Gameplay Trailer | Steam Early Access
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE APRIL 6TH on Steam Early Access:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/625730/Cefore/
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/cefore
Crytivo: https://crytivo.com/en/cefore
Discord: https://discord.gg/hghx9pr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelz_games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PixelzGames
Website: https://www.playcefore.com/

Did you ever want to be an expert at blowing stuff up? Cefore is a physics-based puzzler with a whimsical and simplistic art-style. In Cefore, you play as Baro and are contracted to demolish structures in the most creative ways possible. As the structures get bigger, your methods of demolition must get more creative.
Test your demolition skills in the campaign before jumping across to sandbox mode for maximum destructive freedom!

For content creators:
You are free to use the footage and/or audio presented in this video within a transformative format (like a reaction video), without fear of copyright infringement, provided you include links in your content's description to this video and https://www.playcefore.com/ You are also free to monetize said content and there is also no automatic Content ID for this video.
